petsitting.title: Sign Up
petsitting.text: Create an account as a pet owner or a pet sitter. Fill in your personal info and add your pet's profile or your experience details.

petsitting.title: Browse Listings
petsitting.text: Use filters like city, type of pet, and availability to find the perfect sitter for your pet.

petsitting.title: Meet & Greet
petsitting.text: Contact sitters and schedule a meeting to ensure it’s the right fit for both sides.

petsitting.title: Make a Deal
petsitting.text: Agree on the care period and pet needs. This deal acts as your digital agreement.

petsitting.title: Pet Drop-off & Payment
petsitting.text: Deliver your pet to the sitter and pay directly in person — no online payment needed.

petsitting.title: Stay Connected
petsitting.text: Use the mobile app to stay in touch and receive updates during the sitting.

petsitting.title: Leave a Review
petsitting.text: After the care period, rate the sitter and share your experience with others.

forum.title: Join the Community
forum.text: Register on the platform to access the forum. Only verified users can post or comment.

forum.title: Ask a Question
forum.text: Post questions related to pet health, behavior, or care. Add a photo if it helps explain your situation.

forum.title: Choose Response Type
forum.text: Decide if you want answers from everyone or only certified vets. Filter replies accordingly.

forum.title: Engage in Discussion
forum.text: Comment on other posts, offer help from your experience, or clarify your needs in your own thread.

forum.title: Stay Notified
forum.text: Receive notifications when someone replies to your post or when your question gets resolved.
